PAD_BombardmentStart.synopsis: The player has entered surprise combat against a Nautiloid, with an initial bombarment followed by the ground being covered in target reticles.
PAD_BombardmentStart.how_to_trigger: Load END_Maingoto 356; 15; 75Go left or right till the bombardment startswait for the first player turn

PAD_BrainStem.synopsis: The players have reached the portion of the upper hall that will lead to the brain battle. The Netherbrain presence can already be seen with brain goo and tentacles coming down from the roof. This AD directs the player that the stem can't be climbed here and that they need to go further up the building.
PAD_BrainStem.how_to_trigger: Approach the Netherbrain stem past in the High Hall Interior (past the courtyard battle in Endgame.)

PAD_KeepGoing.synopsis: The players are making their way up to the Netherbrain while being bombarded by the Nautiloid. Swarms of enemies are joining the combat in an attempt to stop the players. This dialog is to reinforce the goal of moving towards the Netherbrain and that fighting the endless onslaught of enemies is pointless.
PAD_KeepGoing.how_to_trigger: Load END_MainProceed to High Hall InteriorProceed till combat startsPass turns till player AD is triggered

Nautiloid.synopsis: When the player approaches the safe area at the foot of the brainstem.In gameplay, all enemies are killed. The player is not because they're protected by Orpheus' magic.

PAD_BrainStemTouch.synopsis: The players have just touched the base of the brain stem in the entrance of High Hall, resulting in some brain quakes and a AD from the Netherbrain. This PAD reinforces that the party will have to traverse higher in order to climb up the brain.
PAD_BrainStemTouch.how_to_trigger: Load END_Maingoto 350; 15; 75Click on the brain stem

AD_OrpheusCombatStart.synopsis: On Orpheus first turn while the party makes their way to the Netherbrain in High Hall Interior against a firing Nautiloid and waves of Illithid. Orpheus comments on the Nautiloid and the situation at hand.
AD_OrpheusCombatStart.how_to_trigger: Load END_MainDebugbook add Orpheus as a followerEnter High Hall InteriorStart the Nautiloid combatWait til Orpheus turn

AD_Brainquake.synopsis: The player has just entered High Hall Interior. They are on the last stretch before the battle with the Netherbrain. Touching the brain stem causing it to emit a brain quake, taunting the players.

AD_FodderOnGuard.synopsis: Two followers of the Netherbrain stand guard to the room that leads to the Netherbrain stem, which the players can use to climb and start the final battle. They are the last line of defense, along with the Nautiloid.
AD_FodderOnGuard.how_to_trigger: Load END_Mainstatusapply INVISIBILITY goto 409; 33; 62wait for ADs

PAD_BombardmentStart_0.speaker: Player
PAD_BombardmentStart_0.text: Nautiloid! Need to get to the brain - now.

PAD_BrainStem_0.speaker: Player
PAD_BrainStem_0.text: Looks like part of the Netherbrain. But we'll need to be higher up to climb it.

PAD_KeepGoing_0.speaker: Player
PAD_KeepGoing_0.text: There's too many of them, we need to get to the brain - now!

PAD_KeepGoing_1.speaker: Player
PAD_KeepGoing_1.text: They just keep coming - we can't keep fighting them forever!

AD_FodderCombat_002_0.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal
AD_FodderCombat_002_0.text: Sliced and burned. Dashed and diced. They will be offerings to Your splendour.
AD_FodderCombat_002_0.context: NodeContext: 'they' refers to the player, 'Your' refers to the Netherbrain.

Nautiloid_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player rushes towards the brain stem, but falls to the ground as a sudden brain quake shakes the ground, experiencing the pain in their head we see whenever they are exposed in close proximity to the Voice of the Absolute.

Nautiloid_4.context: NodeContext: Voice of elder brain booming down to player who is at the bottom of the brainstem in chaotic hive voice.

Nautiloid_3.context: NodeContext: Hive voice begins to stabilise into solid voice. Player thinks they've finally found the enemy, but the brain was expecting them all along.

Nautiloid_7.text: LEAVE THEM. Join us. Witness perfection.
Nautiloid_7.context: NodeContext: The voice is strong now, 100% confident. 'LEAVE THEM' addressed to all enemy thralls. 'Join us...' addressed to player.

Nautiloid_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Cuts back to gameplay. NodeContext: The voice booms out its final command to us.

Nautiloid_6.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player sneaks towards the brain stem, but falls to the ground as a sudden brain quake shakes the ground, experiencing the pain in their head we see whenever they are exposed in close proximity to the Voice of the Absolute.

AD_FodderCombat_001_0.speaker: Black Gauntlet of Bane
AD_FodderCombat_001_0.text: You will bleed for Her glory.
AD_FodderCombat_001_0.context: NodeContext: spoken like a brainwashed cultist defending a goddess

PAD_BrainStemTouch_0.speaker: Player
PAD_BrainStemTouch_0.text: I suppose we'll need to find somewhere higher up.

AD_OrpheusCombatStart_0.speaker: Orpheus
AD_OrpheusCombatStart_0.text: Gh'ath! The dragons will burn them to ash!

AD_FodderOnGuard_0.speaker: Black Gauntlet of Bane
AD_FodderOnGuard_0.text: Why do they resist their own salvation?

AD_FodderOnGuard_2.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal
AD_FodderOnGuard_2.text: They have not tasted of the Absolute's gifts. They do not know what glory waits.

AD_FodderOnGuard_1.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal
AD_FodderOnGuard_1.text: They will learn how far they have to fall by falling, and by then it will be too late.

AD_FodderOnGuard_6.speaker: Black Gauntlet of Bane
AD_FodderOnGuard_6.text: Such violence, such wreckage - would that we were on the blade-front of slaughter.

AD_FodderOnGuard_5.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal
AD_FodderOnGuard_5.text: We are one army under one rule. Some serve at the fingertips, some in the palm.

AD_FodderOnGuard_3.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal
AD_FodderOnGuard_3.text: We will be the first to see Her rise. The first to witness the future, and the first to enter it.

AD_FodderOnGuard_8.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal
AD_FodderOnGuard_8.text: I dreamt of this day. Baldur's Gate in flames, her delicate spires bound in darkness.

AD_FodderOnGuard_4.speaker: Invoker of Bhaal
AD_FodderOnGuard_4.text: History, power, corruption - all gone. The ground blessed with blood in honour of a new god.

AD_FodderOnGuard_7.speaker: Black Gauntlet of Bane
AD_FodderOnGuard_7.text: And what a god She is. Unparalleled. Complete. Infinite.
